entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] OnSizeAllocated called repeatedly using On<iOS>() .SetUseSafeArea(true); #22090
  • Android Video Capture - MediaPicker.Default.CaptureVideoAsync is saving recorded videos to the Android Gallery #22087
  • Multi-Project App template creates invalid solution when un-checking platforms #22086
    .NET 8 SR5
  • 8.0.21 update breaks android label wrap feature which causes other controls exceeding layout borders #22083
    .NET 8 SR5
  • In iOS, CollectionView row does not shift down if row above it resizes #22082
  • Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22079
    Backlog
  • Error handling is different for compiled bindings #22078
  • [iOS] `FlyoutPage` secondary toolbar items covers `Detail` content on iOS #22077
    Backlog
  • BindableLayout Height loading Time #22076
    Backlog
  • Button rendering overflow issue when padding is set in StackLayout. #22075
    Backlog
  • CollectionView crashes on iOS and MacCatalyst when new items are added and it's in a view which isn't visible #22072
    Backlog
  • VSCode get stuck in Xcode: verifying environment #22071
  • Permissions.CheckStatusAsync<Permissions.Bluetooth> on iOS returns Granted when don't allow is chosen #22070

Closed

  • Applink makes app hang after using back button in Android with MAUI 8 #20267
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid App Fails To Load Certain IFrames #20091
  • Null Pointer Crash in KeyboardAutoScrollManager.AdjustPosition #21160
  • [IOS] KeyboardAutoScrollManager NullReferenceException when focussing Editor/Entry in modal bottom sheet #21726
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Button with image not scaling to HeightRequest on iOS and Android #9734
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Fix Native View Bounding Box are not empty tests for WinUI #9054
    Backlog
  • Preferences crash when debugging in Windows #18385
  • [iOS] Implement PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #19970
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [regression/8.0.3] Android - Cannot create instance of type, no Java peer type found #18819
  • Maui Application not launching #21829
  • ToolTipProperties.Text does not update when used in DataTemplate #21827
  • MAUI CollectionView causes to crash app on both IOS and Android #21855

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in modal pages #22089
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Bump $(MicrosoftMauiPreviousDotNetReleasedVersion) to 8.0.21 (#22066) #22088
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area/templates 📄, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix screenshot for 18242 for new test behavior #22081
  • Bump $(MicrosoftMauiPreviousDotNetReleasedVersion) to 8.0.21 #22066
  • Fix null reference exception in KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when UIWindow is null #21753
    community ✨, area/keyboard, control-window
  • [iOS] Allow compat iOS buttons to resize image and to respect spacing and padding #21759
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Windows] Reenabled ReturnsNonEmptyNativeBoundingBox tests #20238
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing, testing-reenable
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • Fix main #22065

Updated

  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #21304
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • `Microsoft.Maui-dev.sln` contains an invalid path #22033
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Improve error logging for failed resizetizering #22064
    area/single project ☝️
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fixed android toolbar icon change #20166
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-switch, testing-flakiness
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Remove excess check #21883
  • Android mipmap/appicon failing with "APT2260" #21838
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖
  • Border has a 1 pixel thickness even when it's thickness property is set to 0 - fix #21197
    area/drawing ✏️, control-border
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #21733
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Core on Tizen #21925
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
